alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 13 at 1:13PM CDT until March 15 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Tennessee River at Savannah For the Tennessee River...including Pickwick Dam, Savannah, Saltillo, Perryville, Johnsonville...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding continues from previous excessive rainfall. * WHERE...Tennessee River at Savannah. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 366.0 feet, Campsites along Towboat Lane are flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM CDT Monday the stage was 366.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 356.7 feet early Monday afternoon. - Action stage is 365.0 feet. - Flood stage is 370.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
